solution_line_template: {girls_percentage_num}% of his friends are girls because {total_percentage} - {boys_percentage_num} = <<{total_percentage}-{boys_percentage_num}={girls_percentage_num}>>{girls_percentage_num}
He has {girls_count} friends who are girls because {total_friends} x {girls_percentage_decimal} = <<{girls_count}={girls_count}>>{girls_count}
